author: terencechain
content: Sorry for the question. I tried to find where the decision was made but couldn't. For eip7549, is the plan to keep `AttestationData` unchanged and just keep the committee index 0?

author: terencechain
content: Ignore my question. I found the answer in p2p and validator specs. Also opened: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3669

author: m.kalinin

author: stefanbratanov
content: Hi, have a question about the slashing protection ref tests https://github.com/eth-clients/slashing-protection-interchange-tests . Currently adding them to Teku but there was a versioned tests directory `tar.gz` in previous releases, but this is no longer the case. Has it possibly been missed to add them? It would make life easier to run the tests.
